item.title: Transfer files to new server using Ansible
item.description: This is a simple Ansible playbook to use when I need to transfer files from the current server to a new server.

item.title: How to set up Drone CI for GitHub using Ansible
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to set up Drone CI for GitHub using Ansible.
